mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SHAR_GVID_RES_SENDER_${year} ( PIC_ID, GANTRY_ID, GANTRY_HEX, PIC_TIME, GANTRY_ORDER_NUM, DRIVE_DIR, CAMERA_NUM, HOUR_BATCH_NO, SHOOT_POSITION, LANE_NUM, VEHICLE_PLATE, VEHICLE_SPEED, IDENTIFY_TYPE, VEHICLE_MODEL, VEHICLE_COLOR, IMAGE_SIZE, LICENSE_IMAGE_SIZE, BIN_IMAGE_SIZE, RELIABILITY, VEH_FEATURE_CODE, FACE_FEATURE_CODE, VERIFY_CODE, TRADE_ID, MATCH_STATUS, VALID_STATUS, DEAL_STATUS, RELATED_PIC_ID, ALL_RELATED_PIC_ID, STATION_DB_TIME, STATION_DEAL_TIME, STATION_VALID_TIME, STATION_MATCH_TIME ) VALUES ( #{picId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gantryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gantryHex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gantryOrderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{driveDir,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cameraNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hourBatchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shootPosition,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{laneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehiclePlate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleSpeed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{identifyType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vehicleModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{licenseImageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{binImageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reliability,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehFeatureCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faceFeatureCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{validStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dealStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{relatedPicId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allRelatedPicId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationDbTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stationDealTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stationValidTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stationMatchTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

INSERT INTO TBL_SHAR_GVID_RES_SENDER_${year} ( PIC_ID, GANTRY_ID, GANTRY_HEX, PIC_TIME, GANTRY_ORDER_NUM, DRIVE_DIR, CAMERA_NUM, HOUR_BATCH_NO, SHOOT_POSITION, LANE_NUM, VEHICLE_PLATE, VEHICLE_SPEED, IDENTIFY_TYPE, VEHICLE_MODEL, VEHICLE_COLOR, IMAGE_SIZE, LICENSE_IMAGE_SIZE, BIN_IMAGE_SIZE, RELIABILITY, VEH_FEATURE_CODE, FACE_FEATURE_CODE, VERIFY_CODE, TRADE_ID, MATCH_STATUS, VALID_STATUS, DEAL_STATUS, RELATED_PIC_ID, ALL_RELATED_PIC_ID, STATION_DB_TIME, STATION_DEAL_TIME, STATION_VALID_TIME, STATION_MATCH_TIME )

mapper.update:
UPDATE TBL_SHAR_GVID_RES_SENDER_${year}
GANTRY_ID = #{gantryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GANTRY_HEX = #{gantryHex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

GANTRY_ORDER_NUM = #{gantryOrderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

CAMERA_NUM = #{cameraNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

VEHICLE_COLOR = #{vehicleColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMAGE_SIZE = #{imageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},

BIN_IMAGE_SIZE = #{binImageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RELIABILITY = #{reliability,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VEH_FEATURE_CODE = #{vehFeatureCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACE_FEATURE_CODE = #{faceFeatureCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERIFY_CODE = #{verifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADE_ID = #{tradeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

DEAL_STATUS = #{dealStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},

STATION_DB_TIME = #{stationDbTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

STATION_VALID_TIME = #{stationValidTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATION_MATCH_TIME = #{stationMatchTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
WHERE PIC_ID = #{picId}
